GeneticAlgorithmFeaturesSelection package

Module contents

class GeneticAlgorithmFeaturesSelection.GA.FeatureSelection(features, target, population_size=20, tourn_size=10, mut_rate=0.1, elite_rate=0.5, no_generation=30, fitness_alpha=0.5, method='SVM', method_params=None, k_folds=5, scoring='f1_score', n_job=-1, n_processes=1)[source]

Bases: object

__init__(features, target, population_size=20, tourn_size=10, mut_rate=0.1, elite_rate=0.5, no_generation=30, fitness_alpha=0.5, method='SVM', method_params=None, k_folds=5, scoring='f1_score', n_job=-1, n_processes=1)[source]
Parameters

  • features – pandas dataframe of all features

  • target – pandas dataframe of classification labels

  • population_size – size of population (default 20)

  • tourn_size – size of selected choromosom for tournoment as paraents (default 10)

  • mut_rate – rate of maturation (default 0.1)

  • elite_rate – rate of elite transfer to next generation (default 0.4)

  • no_generation – number of generation (default 30)

  • fitness_alpha – parameter for trade-off between regularization term and accuracy term (default 0.5)

  • method – name of classification method (default SVM)

  • method_params – parameters of classification method

  • k_folds – number of k-fold cross validtion (default 5)

  • scoring – metric for performance methods (default f1-score)

  • n_job – number of jobs for classification method (defult -1)

  • n_processes – number of processor using for building next generation (default 1)

intital_population()[source]

build initial population :return: list of numpy array each of element represent as chromosome

generate_population()[source]

generate chromosome of population :return: chromosome represent existance of feature in featues list

build_model()[source]

build models by configuration :return: sklearn models by configuration

fitness_regularization(individual)[source]

regularization term for fitness score :param individual: one chromosome :return: regularization score. percentage of feature not exist in feature list

make_score()[source]
fitness_method_accuaracy(individual)[source]

accuracy term for fitness score :param individual: one chromosome :return: accuracy of model for chromosome

fitness_function(individual)[source]

fitness function for chromosome :param individual: one chromosome :return: fitness score of chromosome

fitness_population()[source]

find fitness score for chromosomes in population :return: list of fitness score of population

find_elites()[source]

find elite members :return: list of elite chromosomes

crossover(parents1, parents2)[source]

one point crossover :param parents1: chromosome as paraent1 :param parents2: chromosome as paraent2 :return: two children by one point crossover

maturation(child)[source]

maturation one chromosome by mut_rate :param child: chromosome :return: maturation one chromosome

selection()[source]

find best chromosome in tournment for being parent :return: best chromosome in tournment for being parent

make_child(_)[source]

build two child from two parants by one point crossover :return: list of two child

make_new_generation(verbose)[source]

build new generation and find best feature set by generation :param verbose: status that show result of each generation (default True)

find_best_result_population(verbose, initial=False)[source]

find best result of generation and set feature set :param initial: :param verbose:

run(verbose=True)[source]

run process :param verbose: :return:
